Description.description: The non-receiptable portion of the total header amount
Value of the Amount (Non-Tax Deductible) in base currency.
This is the amount (typically dollar value although this application is capable of multiple currencies) of the donation.
Value of the Amount (Tax Deductible) in base currency.
The amount of tax attributed towards this transaction record, used when combining memberships or products in transactions
Value of the Amount (Tax) in base currency.
The appeal this transaction is related to. The appeal is filtered by the campaign . event record. Only appeals that are assigned to the campaign /event in question can be used.
Set the gateway processor, you can integrate with only one payment processor from the list provided.
The Country of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The first line of the receipt-able address, defaulted from the constituent or organization selected.
The second line of the receipt-able address, defaulted from the constituent or organization selected.
The third line of the receipt-able address, defaulted from the constituent or organization selected.
The postal code line of the receipt-able address, defaulted from the constituent or organization selected.
The province line of the receipt-able address, defaulted from the constituent or organization selected.
The credit card used from the parent Registration Package
The Check or Wire date of the transaction
The check number of the payment process, mandatory if the user selected 'Check' form the payment type.
The Deposit date of the Cheque or Wire Transfer
The related constituent or organization that the transaction is related to.
The primary email address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The First name of the Donor, defaulted to the value in the 'Donor' attribute.
Gift Batch
The last name of the Donor, defaulted to the value in the 'Donor' attribute.
The mobile phone of the donor
The Organization Name related to the donor (if the donor is a constituent record).
The package this transaction is related to. The package is filtered by the appeal record. Only packages that are assigned to the appeal in question can be used.
This is the parent transaction record for transactions of type credit. This is only used in the Gift Batch process to link child transaction credits to the parent transaction donation.
The type of transaction that the donation or pledge represents, typically this will be Cash, Credit\Debit Card or Cheque however also covers In Kind and Other
The Primary designation for this record
The related receipt record that represents the receipt number and information for this gift.
The total sum of any related donation amount that are type “Refund”
Value of the Total Refunded in base currency.
When a donation is tied to an existing pledge, that pledge in question is listed here.
The primary phone number, defaulted from the constituent or organization selected in the donor attribute.
The secondary or alternate telephone number for the donor.
Third party receipt from an imported or migrated record. This values is used in the receipt generation if it exists
The description of the gift, this is mandatory when a user selects “In-kind”, “Gift”, “Stock” or “Property”.
The type of Transaction, select from the list of options of either Donation or Soft Credit
